name: michaelajaritz
description: The personal website of Michaela Jaritz, business coach and trainer.

scripts.coverage:deploy: (cd ./dist/coverage/lcov-report/ && npm run deploy -- -c ../../../now.coverage.js && npm run alias -- -c ../../../now.coverage.js)
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:generate && npm run coverage:deploy
scripts.storybook:deploy: (cd ./dist/storybook/ && npm run deploy -- -c ../../now.storybook.js && npm run alias -- -c ../../../now.storybook.js)
scripts.storybook: npm run storybook:generate && npm run storybook:deploy
scripts.website:publish: npm run deploy && npm run alias
scripts.deploy-all: npm run coverage && npm run storybook && npm run website:publish

author: Lucas Vogel <contact@vogelino.com> (http://vogelino.com/)
